property_title: Residence for sale with gardens, club club, gym and tennis court
property_description:
Exclusive residence in exclusive subdivision of forest, green areas, club house and strict surveillance.

The fractionation is located three minutes from the Xochimilco Sports Center and ten minutes from Prol.

P.B.: Sala-dining room with a travertine marble floor, with large windows overlooking the inner garden, terrace, large comprehensive kitchen with granite bar, cupboard and breakfast, study with a view of the garden, visits bath, washing room, service room with bathroom, laying area, winery.

P.A.: Main bedroom with balcony (overlooking the garden), with Walk in closet, bathroom and studio, a junior bedroom with Walk in closet, bathroom and balcony, two junior bedroom with Walk in closet, bathroom and balcony, three junior bedroom with walk in closet and bathroom.
The whole house has large windows overlooking the garden, marble floors in the social area and stall floor in bedrooms, bathrooms with tile, tanker, stationary gas, twenty -four hours surveillance with safety system with a closed circuit safety system throughout the fractionation, access control with interface from surveillance booth.

The Club house has roofed and heated pool, tennis and squash court, gym, dressing rooms, steam, game room, multipurpose room, TV room, cafeteria, event room, restaurant, family bar, green bar, green areas with children's games, palapa with grill and beautiful gardens.

Choose to live in a privileged place for its location in a true forest to the south of Mexico City.

Live the benefits of the city and the forest, the wooded landscape, a quiet environment that provides contact with nature, purest air away from pollution, located near important avenues, shopping centers, sports centers, schools, etc.
Check that it is the most exclusive subdivision in the area for only seventy -nine selected families, developed on a plot of more than seventy -five thousand square meters of which forty -five thousand square meters are forest (ash, pines, cedars, eucalyptus, peaches, fig trees) and green areas.

It enjoys tranquility, has a closed circuit system, surveillance and strictly controlled full -time access, totally barded, allows you and your family to enjoy the place without worry and children develop in a healthier way in contact with nature.
Live in contact and harmony with nature in ideal spaces for coexistence with your friends and your family.
These benefits and privileges will remain like this, since there is a qualifying committee of condominiums in charge of residential Tesmic being an exclusive fractionation inhabited by selected families that care, protect, retain and enjoy nature.

We accept and process mortgage loans.
Price subject to change without prior notice.
